about_the_game:
Insentient is a first-person horror experience that keeps you on the edge of your seat. Unravel chilling secrets as you navigate terrifying environments where your decision-making skills are crucial for survival. Drawing inspiration from a range of titles both within and outside the genre, Insentient combines a haunting atmosphere with immersive gameplay, delivering a nightmarish adventure you won’t want to put down.

Welcome to The Rendezvous

In an emerging future dominated by artificial intelligence, an unforeseen system error reveals the dark side of our reliance on technology. Once a luxurious hotel, The Rendezvous has transformed into a twisted maze of horror. Navigate the dark corridors, unravel the haunting story, and harness your physical and mental skills to survive

Crawl, Climb, Sprint and Hide

Your survival is in your hands. Use your agility to navigate the hotel through various traversal options, or take advantage of hiding spots to avoid detection. Choose your strategies wisely as you craft your escape.

​Leverage Intelligence, Tools, and Technology

Use a variety of tools and technology to move unnoticed and gain access to restricted areas. Use these resources strategically to navigate your surroundings, evade detection, and ensure your safety as you strive to survive the lurking dangers

Relentless threats hunting you down

Countless threats will lurk around every corner, making your escape seem utterly hopeless. Harness your survival instincts and skills to navigate this treacherous environment, or risk becoming yet another victim of the relentless slaughter

content_descriptors.notes: This game features intense violence, graphic gore, dismemberment, and dark themes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1070 Ti or AMD Radeon™ RX 5700
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8700K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 2060RTX or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT

short_description: Book a stay at The Rendezvous, the pinnacle of hotel luxury powered by AI. When a system update goes wrong, you find yourself trapped and facing constant danger. Run, climb, hide, or use tools to navigate through the shadows. Forge your escape—or risk becoming a permanent guest.
